GetStationYwdw.station: SELECT s.ID, s.NAME,c.NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_SUBSTATION_B s LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_ORG_COMPANY_B c ON s.MANAGE_DEPT_ID=c.ID WHERE TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE<1004 AND (DCC_ID='0021990101' OR DCC_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_ORG_DCC_B WHERE PARENT_ID='0021990101'))
GetStationYwdw.conver: SELECT s.ID, s.NAME,c.NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B s LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_ORG_COMPANY_B c ON s.MANAGE_DEPT_ID=c.ID WHERE s.OWNER='990101'

ROOT.GetDeviceAssets: SELECT D.ID, D.COL3 AS DEVNAME, D.COL4 AS DEVTYPE, D.COL0 AS STANAME, round(G.INIT_ASSETS_VALUE/10000 ,2), round(G.ASSETS_NET/10000 ,2), round(G.ASSETS_SALVAGE/10000 ,2), round(G.ACCUMULATED_DEPRECIATION/10000 ,2), G.DEPRECIABLE_YEAR, G.COMPLATE_TIZU_MONTH, G.START_DEPRECIABLE FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_SC_DEVICE D JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_SC_GDZC G ON D.ID = G.ID ORDER BY G.COMPLATE_TIZU_MONTH ASC

GetStationYear.station: SELECT ID, OPERATE_DATE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_SUBSTATION_B WHERE TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE<1004 AND (DCC_ID='0021990101' OR DCC_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_ORG_DCC_B WHERE PARENT_ID='0021990101'))
GetStationYear.conver: SELECT ID, OPERATE_DATE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B WHERE OWNER='990101'

ROOT.GetDeviceCount: SELECT COL4,COUNT(COL4),COL5 FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_SC_DEVICE WHERE COL5 LIKE '直流%' OR COL5 IN ('交流500kV','交流1000kV') GROUP BY COL4,COL5

top5.deviceType: SELECT DISTINCT COL4 FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_SC_DEVICE WHERE COL4 IS NOT NULL
top5.factory: SELECT TOP 5 col8,c FROM (SELECT col8,count(1) as c FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_SC_DEVICE WHERE col4={type} GROUP BY col8) ORDER BY c
top5.model: SELECT TOP 5 col8,col7,c FROM (SELECT col8,col7,count(1) as c FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_SC_DEVICE WHERE col4={type} GROUP BY col8,col7) ORDER BY c

ROOT.GetDevices: SELECT COL0,COL3,COL4,COL5,COL7,NVL(f.ABBR,COL8),COL10 FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_SC_DEVICE d LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_GUD_FACTORY f ON d.col8=f.NAME WHERE COL10 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY COL10
ROOT.GetStationCount: SELECT GROUP_NAME, COUNT(GROUP_NAME) FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_SC_STATION GROUP BY GROUP_NAME
ROOT.GetStationCapacity: SELECT COL5 ,SUM(CAST(COL16 as int)) FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_SC_DEVICE WHERE COL16 IS NOT NULL GROUP BY (COL5)
ROOT.GetLineCount: SELECT VOLTAGE,COUNT(VOLTAGE) FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_LINE_HBZC WHERE ID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY VOLTAGE
ROOT.GetStations: SELECT ID,NAME,GRID_NAME,GROUP_NAME,DCLOUD_ID FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_SC_STATION WHERE NAME IS NOT NULL
ROOT.GetDeviceDetailStart: SELECT d.Id,START_DEPRECIABLE,COMPLATE_TIZU_MONTH,COl0,COl3, COL5 ,COL7, COL8,COL10,round(INIT_ASSETS_VALUE/10000 ,2) , round(ASSETS_NET/10000 ,2), round(ASSETS_SALVAGE/10000 ,2), round(ACCUMULATED_DEPRECIATION/10000 ,2), DEPRECIABLE_YEAR,
ROOT.GetDeviceDetailEnd: FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_SC_DEVICE d LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_SC_GDZC z ON d.id=z.id WHERE d.col4 like '%{type}%' ORDER BY COMPLATE_TIZU_MONTH ASC
